name: BrutalAliens
description: BrutalAliens is a game about invasion of alien space colonies, you are equipped with heavy weapons, soldiers troops and tactical skills. You have to eradicate all the alien race called Vorganoidz from the galaxy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.8 GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM 1024MB Storage: 490 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2.4Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM 1024MB Storage: 490 MB available space
